timeline.message:
[BEAM-10546] Remove util.timeout

util.timeout is obsolete since the resolution of BEAM-9009.

[BEAM-10546] Remove util.timeout

util.timeout is obsolete since the resolution of BEAM-9009.

timeline.bodyText: Do you want to replace the decorators with @pytest.mark.timeout(60), etc.?
timeline.author: udim
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,7 +154,6 @@ def process(self, element):
   @unittest.skipIf(
       sys.version_info < (3, 5, 3),
       'The tests require at least Python 3.6 to work.')
-  @timeout(60)

replies.bodyText: All of these timeouts are significantly less than the default. I don't see any reason these tests should be given less time to run than others.
replies.author: ibzib
